sentences.sentence: She tried to accustom herself to the tight bandages.
sentences.translation: 她尝试着使自己习惯那些紧绷的绷带。

sentences.sentence: It took him a while to accustom himself to the idea.
sentences.translation: 他过了一段时间才习惯这个想法。

sentences.sentence: When one has been in a family circle one cannot accustom oneself to this life!
sentences.translation: 当一个人已经在家庭圈子里，他无法习惯于这种生活！
